author: Jillian Vose
description: Lightly spicy with an attractive underlying bready fruitiness from the fresh strawberry and genever.
name: Pirate Queen
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass over chunk of block ice
